A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I wanted to Enjoy this new trilogy but this second film killed it for me. No matter how many times I watch it...it just adds more fuel to the flame. The Last Jedi wants to tell a political message over a great story. Rey still has no character development\, Finn is very meh. Poe is side lines super hard. And a lot of key mysteries introduced in the first film are thrown out the window. With star wars releasing every year now...it's getting very stale. Plus Rian Johnson and Kathleen Kennedy don't wanna listen/nor make great movies for the fans\, they want to the movies for themselves.
